item.title: IT Support
item.description:
Kitchener Chin Baptist Church (2008 - 2014)

As head of IT, I installed and maintained audiovisual equipment, managed Wi-Fi networks, and performed IT maintenance for reliable performance. Provided technical support, implemented data security, trained volunteers, and collaborated with leadership to meet technology needs, ensuring smooth church services and events.

Working Center (2013 - 2014)

item.title: General Labours
item.description:
CNC Operator at Linamar - (2015 - 2017)

Guelph, Ontario

As a CNC Operator at Linamar Gear, my actions directly supported Linamar’s lean system, reducing waste time by 20% and enhancing performance, aligning with core values like innovation and work ethic. By efficiently managing 4 machines, I contributed to the company’s goal of $10 billion sales and double-digit growth, ensuring the production of essential components for Canada’s automotive industry.

General Labour at Grote Electronics - (2014 - 2015)

Waterloo, Ontario

As a General Labourer at Grote Electronics, I supported the company’s lean journey and Kaizen system by ensuring the quality of critical safety systems like brake lights, ABS, and emergency lighting through precise PCB soldering and inspection. My work enhanced operational efficiency, contributing to Grote’s growth in LED technology and its rise to $750 million in annual revenue, advancing its mission as a global leader in vehicle safety and innovation.

item.title: Hackathon
item.description:
HackCanada (Wilfrid Laurier), GameJam x2 (Conestoga College) - (2025 Febuary 21 - 28)

Waterloo, Ontario

I participated in two hackathons, both with over 100+ participants and tight deadlines, emphasizing simplicity, time management, and collaboration. At Hack Canada, we developed a full-stack web solution addressing food shortages, while at Game Jam, we created games using Unity and C# and I managed teams of 3-5. These experiences enhanced my problem-solving, technical, and leadership skills, preparing me to excel in fast-paced, collaborative environments.
